name: John Doe
details: Allergic to peanuts. Needs to be picked up at 3:30 PM.

details: Participates in after-school chess club on Tuesdays and Thursdays.

name: Sarah Williams
details: Vegetarian diet. Brings own lunch. Pick up time is flexible.
